metadata.scenario: Customer support interaction about a billing issue

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm looking at my latest bill, and it's showing a charge for $75 for a premium service I never signed up for. This is really frustrating, I've been a customer for years and never had this happen before!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your frustration. I can certainly look into that charge for you. Could you please provide me with your account number or the phone number associated with your account?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 555-123-4567. Also, can you tell me *exactly* how a premium service got added to my account without my consent? I'm really concerned about the security of my account if that's possible.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I've located your account. I see the charge for the premium service. After investigating, it appears there was a promotional offer sent out, and it seems it may have been automatically added to accounts that met certain criteria. I have removed the premium service and credited your account $75. This should reflect in your next billing cycle. As for how it was added without direct consent, the system does not require confirmation under some promotional circumstances, which I understand is not ideal, but I have noted this feedback. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
